title: Beethoven.Sonatas.Valentina.Lisitsa
description:
These sonatas, performed here by Valentina Lisitsa, are also available at torrent #5592430 and also on YouTube, and in both cases also at 1080p.

Here I have combined and converted them (without any encoding or loss of quality) to AVI format in order to have them play without interruption, as they most definitely should in the way they are laid out here.

For instance the Hammerklavier sonatas 1-5 should not be broken up into 5 different segments as there is no pause between the first two and the last three movements. You could break it up into 1-2 and then 3-5 of course.

Moonlight, similarly, could be broken up as movements 1-2 followed by 3 and the Appassionata sonatas as 1 followed by 2-3 together.

Anyway, that's all very complicated and it's much easier to just group them by title and, if possible, glue the various movements together (by demultiplex/multiplex using avidemux as I have done here) without having to re-encode the video data (or audio) data.

- user10196
